name: 克劳迪奥·布鲁克 Claudio Brook
intro: Claudio Brook (28 August 1927 — 18 October 1995) was a Mexican actor. Born in Mexico City, Brook had a prolific career, making around 100 film and television appearances in his 38 years. He won two Ariel Awards. He died from stomach cancer in 1995.
birthplace: 墨西哥,墨西哥城联邦区
